about_the_game:
Who is Abby is a gripping narrative-driven experience that blends exploration with interactive puzzle-solving, spanning eight chapters of relaxed gameplay. Tom’s sister, Abby, has disappeared. Distrustful of the authorities Tom takes matters into his own hands, whilst searching for her. With each chapter, the mystery deepens, drawing you closer to the truth behind Abby’s disappearance.

Who is Abby relies on atmosphere and environmental storytelling rather than horror or jump scares, offering a rich, immersive experience driven by mood and exploration that anyone can enjoy.

Explore Exquisitely Detailed Worlds

Journey through eight meticulously crafted chapters, each set in a unique environment rich with atmosphere and hidden stories. Every location you explore is a new piece of the puzzle, teeming with details that beg to be uncovered. The expansive environments are filled with secrets and interactable objects, making each chapter a substantial experience in its own right.

Engage with the World Around You

As you search for Abby, interact with hundreds of objects that hold the key to unravelling the mystery. Every item you inspect could be crucial to your progress, revealing more of the story and aiding your quest. The game rewards thorough exploration and rewards you for noticing even the smallest details, adding layers of complexity to each chapter.

Become the Detective

Help Tom turn detective in Who is Abby, where every corner hides a clue, and every clue could bring you one step closer to the truth. The vast world around you is filled with secrets, and it's up to you to piece them together. Each chapter introduces new environments and challenges, keeping you engaged as you uncover the game’s deep narrative.

Unveil the Truth Behind Abby’s Disappearance

As you progress, you'll explore Abby’s personal spaces, uncovering the subtle details of her life. Each discovery adds another piece to the puzzle, gradually revealing the story behind her disappearance.

Overcome the Obstacles in Your Path

Tom is desperate for answers, and nothing will stand in his way. Use your wits, bend the rules if you must, and don’t let anything stop you from finding Abby. The game’s large, interconnected world ensures that every choice you make carries weight, with consequences that ripple throughout the chapters.

Key Features:


Narrative-Driven Exploration: A captivating blend of narrative and gameplay, merging the immersive storytelling of walking simulators with the hands-on witty interaction of classic point-and-click adventures. Navigate through a multi-chapter story that keeps you guessing until the very end. With each chapter offering hours of gameplay, the game delivers a substantial experience that keeps you engaged from start to finish.

Interactive Worlds: Every environment is richly detailed and interactive, filled with clues and secrets essential to unravelling the story. The game’s vast environments reward exploration, with each chapter introducing new locations and deeper mysteries to uncover.

Stunning Graphics and Sound: Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Who is Abby delivers cutting-edge visuals and immersive soundscapes, bringing Tom’s world to life with unparalleled realism. Experience richly detailed environments, whether you're in ray-traced or non-raytraced modes, across the game’s extensive chapters.

Full Control Customization: Enjoy seamless support for both keyboard and controller. Customize your experience with remappable keys for keyboard and mouse, as well as an invertible Y-axis.

Diverse Graphics Options: Tailor your visual experience with various graphics presets, including ray-traced and non-raytraced options, ensuring optimal performance on your system.

Unlock the Bonus Museum Chapter: Venture deeper into the world of Who is Abby with a special museum chapter, packed with additional lore and secrets as you progress through the game. This bonus chapter adds even more depth to an already rich narrative experience.

Collectibles to Discover: Scattered throughout the world, collectibles await your discovery, each one adding another layer to the mystery. The extensive world is filled with secrets that encourage replayability, as you strive to uncover everything the game has to offer.

Are you ready to uncover the truth? The mystery of Abby’s disappearance is waiting to be solved—dare to find out what really happened?

Got VR? This is our other game

JOIN US ON DISCORD

name: Who is Abby

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / 5700 XT with at least 6 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: If you do not have a GPU that supports Ray-Tracing ensure you set the graphics settings to Ray-Tracing disabled.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 with 10 GB VRAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: For optimal performance in the most demanding areas of the game, an RTX 3080 or higher with at least 10 GB of VRAM is recommended.

short_description: You play as Tom, searching for his missing sister in this stunning first-person walking sim meets point-and-click adventure. A psychological thriller where you unravel a mystery through exploration and puzzle-solving—no horror, just suspense and intrigue as you reveal more about her disappearance.
